summary: This is standalone armored version of original Dimon99 white SFW bikinis for Main body from DIMONIZED UNP female body mod. You can make it using blacksmith forge and upgrade using  blacksmith table. Meshes and textures are original unmodified. Also, you can find it in your inventory from beginning of game.
descriptionHtml:
First of all, I apologize to those who do not like my English. My main languages are Ukrainian and Russian. Thank you.
I made this mod for myself, because I like beautiful  \"DIMONIZED UNP female body\" mod. I installed Dimon99 mod because i like to see a beautiful body but not to hide it.I can listen to any objections about this, but do not agree with them. :) 
What this mod does:
This is standalone armored version of original Dimon99 white SFW bikinis for Main body from DIMONIZED UNP female body mod. You can make it using blacksmith forge and upgrade using  blacksmith table. Meshes and textures are original unmodified. Also, you can find it in your inventory from beginning of game.

Version 2.2 
Now you can use some new pieces: new UNPGauntlets, UNPHootersBra, UNPHootersMicroSkirt and  UNPStocking.
UNPHootersBra use Body slot, UNPHootersMicroSkirt use slot 45 and UNPStocking use slot 44. Use leather to create and temper bra, use linen to create and temper micro skirt and stockings. Use your imagination to create a combination of these pieces of clothing. ;)
For those who are lazy:
ARMO
  _ _000D63 UNPArmoredBikini
  _ _00387A UNPArmoredHat
  _ _00387B UNPArmoredShoes
  _ _004348 UNPGauntlets
  _ _006E5B UNPHootersBra
  _ _006E5A UNPHootersMicroSkirt
  _ _006E5C UNPStocking

 _ _ is your load order

I hope you enjoy playing my mod.

Required:
DIMONIZED UNP female body http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709
Install
Unpack archive to temporary location, copy/paste in game Data folder, overwrite.
Personally I always use Wrye Bash to install/uninstall any mod or projects. If you know how to use it- use it. If not, use NMM. It is a simple mod.  
Uninstall:
Delete folder: 
Data/meshes/clothes/UNP bikini
Data/Textures/clothes/UNP bikini
Delete Data/UNPArmoredBikini.esp

Changes:
v. 1.1
Corrected texture path in bikini_1.nif. Now \"heavy body\" can use the same textures for bikinis as all others. Otherwise, it\'s  the textures from textures.bsa

v. 2
This version included main outfit and added hood, boots, gauntlets. All armor you can make yourself using blacksmith forge and upgrade using blacksmith table.

v. 2.2 
Now you can use some new pieces: new UNPGauntlets, UNPHootersBra, UNPHootersMicroSkirt and  UNPStocking.
UNPHootersBra use Body slot, UNPHootersMicroSkirt use slot 45 and UNPStocking use slot 44. Use leather to create and temper bra, use linen to create and temper micro skirt and stockings. Use your imagination to create a combination of these pieces of clothing. ;)
author: ortog
